data.message: you are the real hero.... you changed the way of thinking.... u changed the world!!!!

replies.message:
He is NO hero. Far from it. He's a multimillionaire (billionaire?) 

The real hero's are the ones fighting to keep our country safe. 

The police that patrol our streets.

The fireman that go in buildings to save lives.

The soldiers that have given the ultimate sacrifice.

Not Mark Zuckerberg.

Everybody have their own way of thinking and i really do respect your thoughts     .....the ones u mentioned are also the heroes but you cannot deny the fact that  technology together with Facebook contributed a lot for this modern world..... for me #Mark and #facebook has become the source of inspiration in many ways ......
We appreciate your support, Subarna. We hope you have a great day! -Jon

Karen Scott one thing you should reconsider, this dude is kind of intelligence service, He owns the secrets of almost entire humanity.  They know every step you take, they know everyplace you go, they know what u like or what u don't like, they know who you vote or who you don't like, they even know if you are vegetarian or not, so tell me would you give this informations to someone you don't know. Yeah you did. We all did. Mark Zuckerberg please dont disgrace us lol at least dont share informations with the governments
Honestly? I think each and everyone of us needs to disconnect from social media all together.

Heroism does not mean only by gambling his life into death,,but in a sense of a help without asking in return,,Facebook have helped millions of people in a thousands of different situations,,....

I give back my heartfelt thanks to Facebook..long live! 

God bless us all.
Miss Scott if you will do that your life would become sad..
You're amazing Mr. Mark  :)  God bless you always!

Karen Scott yes because he actually did something with his life. He's very intelligent and has raised tons of money through facebook for very good causes and actually cares about our future. Yes, what you said is also true about the soldiers and all emergency personnel who put their lives on the line...but I guess they are the only ones who get to take the credit when it comes to being a hero in someone's eyes. Smh 🙄😐

to achieve heroism,putting the life into risk is not always required.heroism can be achieved if we can change the regular pattern to achieve the positive impact in living....Today Facebook has helped people in many ways. today facebook not only connects hearts and make communication easy but its also source of information and knowledge,extending business and promotion of products has never been so easy as today in absence of social marketing like facebook....
Facebook how about a response to Karen's response? People throw "hero" around too much
@karen then why are u on fb?
Karen Scott then disconnect nobody stopping you lmao
